text: Captain Salvation is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by John S. Robertson and released by MGM. It stars Lars Hanson, Pauline Starke and Marceline Day. On January 18, 2010 the film had its first home video release on the Warner Archives series.Captain Salvation on silentera.com databaseThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films: Captain SalvationThe Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Captain Salvation ==Cast== * Lars Hanson as Anson Campbell * Marceline Day as Mary Phillips * Pauline Starke as Bess Morgan * Ernest Torrence as Captain * George Fawcett as Zeke Crosby * Sam De Grasse as Peter Campbell * Jay Hunt as Nathan Phillips * Eugenie Besserer as Mrs. Buxom * Eugenie Forde as Mrs. Bellows * Flora Finch as Mrs. Snifty * James A.
